author: reshm
title: Cardano Builders' Hub India
description: How to bring together developers and experts from the large IT industry in India to find synergies build on Cardano?
solution: Create a hub for software engineers in India to get together, ideate, incubate and develop on Cardano.
experience: Loxe Inc. team, experienced and hackathon winning group of Plutus developers, participants of Gimbalabs PPBL, and experienced web developers
